bs-readers-desc: Creates a list of the people who read a page
apihelp-bs-readers-data-store-descriptio: Get reader info of specific page.
apihelp-bs-readers-data-store-summary: Get reader info of specific page.
apihelp-bs-readers-users-store-descripti: Get all readers info of specific page.
apihelp-bs-readers-users-store-summary: Get all readers info of specific page.
apihelp-bs-readers-page-readers-store-su: Gets all readers of all pages
right-viewreaders: Allows viewing readers of a page
